programme.title: North Woods Law

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete descends upon western Washington to make a tree house for action and relaxation; with a 55-foot-long bouncy-bridge entryway into a 20-foot-high structure and a zip line that travels through the forest, this tree house generates non-stop thrills.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Two retirees get a retreat on their 100-acre Wisconsin farm; Pete builds a barnlike birdhouse with three separate pods -- an art studio, an office and a lounge -- complete with a screened-in porch and a deck overlooking their stable of alpacas.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Pete and his gang ride out to the Lone Star State to build a double-decker hideout in Texas Hill Country; Pete creates rustic perfection in six live oak trees with a saloon-style first floor for sippin' sarsaparilla and a glass floor for views below.

programme.title: Wardens of the North

programme.title: Wardens of the North
programme.desc: A hunter insists he's searching for coyotes when he's caught using an unauthorized gun; officers track down a man who killed a deer first and bought his license later; hunters raise concern when they're too close to houses.

programme.title: Down to Earth
programme.desc: Accidentally sent to Heaven, a comic (Chris Rock) returns to Earth in the body of a Manhattan mogul whose family is plotting to kill him.

programme.title: Yes Man

programme.desc: Following in his father's (Chevy Chase) footsteps, Rusty Griswold (Ed Helms) takes his wife (Christina Applegate) and two sons on a cross-country road trip to America's favorite fun park, Walley World.

programme.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry

programme.title: Barbershop
programme.desc: The owner of a popular barbershop considers selling the place to a loan shark who wants to convert it into a strip club.

programme.title: Shiva Baby
programme.desc: While at a Jewish funeral service with her parents, a college student has an awkward encounter with her sugar daddy and her ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Shiva Baby

programme.title: Rescue Dawn

programme.title: Pure
programme.desc: An insecure girl grapples with fears of embracing her sexuality.

programme.title: Music Within
programme.desc: After losing most of his hearing in the Vietnam War, Richard Pimentel (Ron Livingston) becomes a motivational speaker and a driving force behind the Americans With Disabilities Act.

programme.title: Philomena
programme.desc: Journalist Martin Sixsmith (Steve Coogan) helps Philomena Lee (Judi Dench) search for her long-lost son, who was taken from her by nuns in an Irish convent and sold into adoption when she was an unwed teenager.

programme.title: Killing Me Softly
programme.desc: A woman (Heather Graham) grows suspicious of her controlling husband (Joseph Fiennes) after she discovers secrets about the women in his past.

programme.title: Let Me In
programme.desc: A misfit boy (Kodi Smit-McPhee) suspects that his only friend (Chloë Grace Moretz), an eerie child who only appears at night, is hiding a terrible secret.

programme.title: Hotel Artemis
programme.desc: As rioting rocks Los Angeles in the year 2028, an arms dealer, a French assassin, disgruntled thieves and an injured cop make their way to Hotel Artemis -- a members-only hospital for criminals that's operated by a high-tech healer called the Nurse.

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: A plane crash strands rivals (Anthony Hopkins, Alec Baldwin) in the Alaskan wilderness, where they contend with nature and a vicious kodiak bear.

programme.title: I Am Wrath
programme.desc: A man sets out to get his own justice after police are unable to catch his wife's killer.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
programme.desc: A top-secret spy agency recruits an uncouth but promising street kid into its highly competitive training program, just as a twisted technological genius threatens the world.

programme.title: American Heist
programme.desc: Within 24 hours of being released from a 10-year sentence, Frankie (Adrien Brody) threatens to drag his brother James (Hayden Christensen) back into the criminal underworld that nearly swallowed them both years before.

programme.title: Line of Duty
programme.desc: FBI agents Bobby (Jeremy Ray Valdez) and Julian (Will Rothhaar) infiltrate a drug cartel run by Jason (Walter Perez) and Derek (Joseph Julian Soria), their childhood friends.

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: On an alien planet, a mercenary (Adrien Brody) and his ragtag band of fighters struggle to survive against an onslaught of fearsome warriors who hunt them for sport.

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: A 1920s football star (George Clooney) tries to give his sagging sport a boost, while he and a new teammate (John Krasinski) vie for the affections of a feisty newswoman (Renée Zellweger).

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: One of Dave's all time favorite designs is the Mercedes Gullwing, and a new client arrives with a kit version of the car; the car kit has many flaws, which the team need to address while trying to get the car as close as they can to original.

programme.title: Bitchin' Rides
programme.desc: Every inch of the Mercedes Gullwing has finally been addressed and the car comes to an epic conclusion; questions and challenges remain, including which color will be just right and whether or not the doors will actually function.

programme.desc: Sam engages a high school group in the automotive industry.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek teams up with his brother Sean to convert a 1966 Oldsmobile F-85 from a wannabe drag racer into a timeless cruiser; it'll take more than a paint job to make this car street-able, as the guys discover the engine is keeping a horrible secret.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek Bieri and Dave Chappelle find an old dually among a flock of chickens; with the goal of building this rig into a car-hauling shop truck, Derek sets his sights on major performance upgrades, while Dave gets to work on a custom suspension setup.

programme.desc: Ian goes over the top on a wild creation.

programme.title: Restoration Garage

programme.title: Restoration Garage

programme.title: Restoration Garage

programme.title: Restoration Garage

programme.title: Restoration Garage

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Goodway and the twins are late getting back from snowshoeing, Jake and Everest call the PAW Patrol to search for them; when water in the duck pond mysteriously drains out, it is up to the Paw Patrol to find out what's happening.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a crevasse; Daring Danny wants a cool pet of his own.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a museum; when Omar the mail carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When the pups find out a beaver is to blame for the power being out, they build it a new home to bring the power back.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When a baby caribou winds up speeding down a mountainside, it's up to the PAW Patrol to save the calf and reunite it with its family; when Luke Stars gets blown away in a giant tumbleweed, Digi and Tal make a duplicate which dances out of control.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck messes up the beach, Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck comes to the rescue; when a gift of armor for the Princess gets scattered all over town, Rocky uses his Re-Use It Truck to put the armor back together.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When an eel accidentally swallows a piece of the meteor and becomes gigantic, it's up to the Mighty Pups to save Adventure Bay; after Sweetie decides to commandeer the Princess's royal carriage and horses, Sid the pirate sends Arrby to steal it.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him; when Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and his team of pups must take on 10-year-old genius Codi Gizmodi, who has her sights set on building her own high-tech city to replace Adventure Bay; joining the team are Everest, Tracker, Sweetie, Tuck and Ella, Rex, Liberty and more.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: A collection of Tracker's greatest rescues with the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Rubble's cousin Charger visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe; Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a Shiniest Ride Contest, so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Liberty comes to visit the pups just in time to help save the Turbots and their radar doppler in a daring mountain rescue; when Farmer Al builds a windmill, the wind takes Farmer Yumi and Garby on a wild flight.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: After Chickaletta accidentally takes flight on a toy airplane, it's up to the team to rescue her; Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey, racing to find it and cover up his blunder.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The heroic rescue pups, led by a tech-savvy boy named Ryder work together to protect the community; geared with special skills, gadgets and vehicles that help them on their rescue missions, the PAW Patrol is always up for the challenge.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: The Movie
programme.desc: When their biggest rival, Humdinger, starts wreaking havoc as the mayor of Adventure City, Ryder and everyone's favorite heroic pups kick into high gear to face the challenge.
